text: hi everyone today I'm making this amazes
boss it's a Chinese influence snack that
is popular in many Asian countries
including Vietnam
if the deep fried pastry made from
glutinous rice flour and coated in CSM
Isis in northern Vietnam is called
Mandarin and in southern Vietnam is
called bun cam this is a bun cam vendor
in Saigon the version is a little
smaller and flatter but the filling is
pretty much the same as in other parts
of Vietnam which is made from Sweden
mung beans pastes
the outside is crispy and chewy which
makes it a really interesting snack so
let's give it a try recipe
firstly wash the mung beans a few times
until the water become clear and then
soak in water for at least 1 hour or
until a pours in size then add water
just enough to barely cover the beans
and cook in the rice cooker until soft
after that transfer into a food
processor or bowl add 4 tablespoons of
sugar a tablespoons of vegetable oil and
process or mash into a fine paste add
some shredded young coconuts if you have
then divide and shape into balls you can
get them in small size about a 1 TSP or
in larger size about a tablespoon then
cover and chill in the fridge while we
prepare the dough for the dough you will
need 50 gram of mashed potato so you can
steam boil on microwave potato until
salt and then mash it with a spoon or
you can also buy potato flakes that are
so at Western supermarket in that case
mix 2 tbsp of potato flakes with 4 tbsp
of boiling hot water and mix well to get
the instant mashed potato so to make the
dough you need 250 gram or 2 cups of
glutinous rice flour 2 tablespoons of
normal rice
flower four tablespoons sugar 50 gram or
a quarter cup of mashed potato and half
a teaspoon of salt the rice flour and
mashed potato help to make the jump link
crispy and also prevent it from cracking
and Wendy fright you need to use warm
water to make this dough about 200ml or
1/2 and 1/3 cup of warm water it might
vary a little bit depending on the
quality of the flour you have mix it
with a spatula until the flour absorbs
all the water then you wear with your
hand until it forms into a doll then
cover and let it rest for about half an
hour to assemble the system meatballs
prepare half a cup pop season mixes in a
small bowl pinch a piece of dough and
form into a ball then flatten it out
into a disc place a feeling ball in the
center and flip it over to let the dough
wrap up the filling pinch the edges
together making sure there is no air in
between the dough and the filling shape
it nicely into a ball then roll the ball
in the season basis try to get as many
seasoned misses to stick to the dough as
possible then roll it one more time in
between your bumps to get a perfect
round ball and also to let the system AC
stick tight to the dough and they will
not fall off when we deep-fry heat two
inches of vegetable oil until bubbles
appear around the chopstick then gently
and carefully slide the sesame balls
into the hot oil
if fry on medium heat for about 20 to 30
minutes until golden brown occasionally
rotate the balls so they are Brau evenly
and that also helps the ball to have a
nice shape
when the balls are nice and golden brown
remove and let them rest on a rack or a
paper towel to drain off the excess oil

press it to distribute the filling
evenly and eat it like a sandwich
there's another version of Bundren with
savory fillings and we call it bang bang
man the filling is similar to bangoy and
wrapped in the same character into oval
shape
then deep-fry and serve with fresh
greens and lipping sauce if you like my
